MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA10 postcode area of St Helens, affecting properties in Crossley Road and surrounding street. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.22am. Our engineers are on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.54am on 28th of Jan 2021.
